subject: fix(docs): correct inaccuracies found during review
body:
Tutorial Step 2: Removed false claim that long-press connects items.
The context menu only has Edit/Duplicate/Delete — there is no UI for
manually creating arcs between existing nodes. Reworded to "Create and
Explore" focusing on what actually works (selecting, viewing details).

AppTab type: Removed dead 'upload' and 'query' values from the union.
These tabs were planned in the Product Realignment Phase 2 but never
built — import and query were integrated into the Graph tab instead
(import via modals, query bar inline). Updated useAppMode to stop
accepting stale values, and updated tests to match.

Arc count: Corrected "~50 arcs" to "44 arcs" in CLAUDE.md and
discovery doc to match actual demoArcs array length.

Tags: docs, types, cleanup, accuracy
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: documentation
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_016xsjTMjavoQa1P26ivfZ6A
title: correct inaccuracies found during review
